Reviews.Title: “Worst Experience Ever!”
Reviews.Author: Aggy D
Reviews.Content: Rooms although appeared tidy, smelled of vomit. Bathrooms were very small and outdated and toilets wouldn't flush properly. Air conditioners were very noisy. Definitely not enough parking spaces. The front desk clerks were friendly, but the Manager was rude and unpleasant. A. Dusevic

Reviews.Title: “Its ok if you need an affordable place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Shannonlmk
Reviews.Content: I will give the good and the bad reviews about our stay. The first morning that the maid came, we asked her to come back after about 20 minutes and she went off on how many rooms she had to clean and asked if we needed it to be cleaned or could she just leave us clean towels. We just took the towels since she seemed to be to busy to come back at a later time. The second morning no maid ever came at all. My husband had to get towels and toilet paper off of a maid cart he saw outside of another room. They also didnt supply coffee for the coffee pot. Every hotel Ive ever stayed at has had coffee packets in the room. The room was a nice size, yet the kitchen is outdated. The cabinants smelled of strong musty wood and the dishes in them had this smell to. There was no stopper for the drain to wash dishes so you had to just wash them under the water as it ran and add dish soap to each thing you washed. There was mold in the bathroom also. When we checked out, the man asked if we needed a receipt and I said no, he then said well this is all I need then as he took our room keys and said have a good day. He never asked how our stay was or anything. (If he had, I wouldve told him about the maid not ever cleaning our room) The staff checking us in though was very nice and helpful with finding our room and giving us parking instructions. They also charge for each adult in the room and they count children over 7 as an adult. Ive never had a hotel do that before. The good things about this motel was the size of the pool. They did have allot of chairs and it was a huge pool. Very nice area to lounge in. The beach is close also. For the most part, it was ok for the price but I doubt we will stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend trip to the Beach.”
Reviews.Author: Nick S
Reviews.Content: Real nice place to stay.Real short walk to the beach with a real big pool.park your car and take the bus to go to the boardwalk for a fun weekend.A perfect place to stay if you are on a budget..

Reviews.Title: “Great beach location, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Tod S
Reviews.Content: I found the place to be very nice. The room was exceptionally clean. The beds very nice. New AC unit that worked great! 2nd/3rd floor "Ocean view rooms" are no charge and a good suggestion. Parking was always available and a very short walk to the beach. Great deli/store right across the street! Staff was very friendly and did accomodate a 1 night stay request.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and family friendly”
Reviews.Author: LeittenJ
Reviews.Content: Relaxing pool right next to all the rooms, but closes early enough so people swimming wont wake you up. Maid service came back if we weren't out of the room yet. Unfortunately, the location is about a 10 min bus ride to the boardwalk, which costs a dollar one way

Reviews.Title: “Clean room, great price, horrible food, unexpected house guest...”
Reviews.Author: KenandChelle
Reviews.Content: We visited Ocean City for a couple days in late June 2012. The room seemed extremely clean, housekeeping was polite and the location to the beach was great. Parking wasn't a problem and there is a nice large pool. On our last morning there, we woke up to find there was a mouse(attempting to escape a mouse trap) in our room. When we called the front desk, they asked if the trap was ours(It wasn't so it must have been left from the previous guest. I think housekeeping should have noticed). As they took care of the problem, we decided to have breakfast at their diner 'General's Kitchen.' Don't eat there...it was horrible. The menu is overpriced, some of the food seemed re-heated and my boyfriend and I agreed it was probably the worst breakfast we both have ever had...bubble guts for the next 2 days. We recommend if you rent an efficiency, use it. When leaving, the hotel staff did not ask how our stay was. We would have told them it was great if it weren't for the last day.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Meredith D
Reviews.Content: For the shore, this place is pretty good. Super close to the beach, big pool, and close to a couple decent restaurants. The room was clean and parking was not an issue. Beds could have been better and the stairs were steep but def. a good stay. Will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Fine for the beach”
Reviews.Author: Patty L
Reviews.Content: This is not very fancy, but perfectly suitable for the beach. Easy beach access, a little further from the honky-tonk area, rooms are fine -- you don't feel too bad walking in w/ sandy feet. I think everyone has a balcony for hanging towels, and there is a nice big pool, as well as tables and umbrellas around. My daughter's soccer team stayed here, and it was fun to hang at the pool after the hot day, order some pizzas and chill out. Our room had a full size fridge, sink, and 2 burner stove - could be convenient if you are staying any length of time. A couple of inexpensive restaurants within walking distance. All in all, satisfied - we'd stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Not enough paking and they don't enforce parking permits”
Reviews.Author: Timofcim
Reviews.Content: Never staying here again.... The parking is probably the worst issue this place has. Don't bother contacting hotel management about non permitted vehicles parking in permit lots. They have no system in place to see wat vehicle are listed jnder actual guests. Noisiest A/C I ever been around. The fire department is directly across the corner from hotel. Had a thunderstorm last night and water came in under the door on the 3rd floor. No dividers in room so very limited in room privacy. TV is bolted to dresser so don't count on convienence of in room comfort. Place isn't that bad. I'm more irritated with the fact that out of 27 different trips to ocean city this is the bottom of the spectrum for my experiences. P.s. The wifi rarely works...

Reviews.Title: “Beware terrible cancellation policy and customer service”
Reviews.Author: Amanda K
Reviews.Content: I have not yet had the opportunity to stay at the Beachmark, but I wanted to warn others about the inflexibility and impracticality of the cancellation policy at this establishment. Their cancellation policy is a 100% forfeiture of the deposit if the cancellation is made less than 7 days prior to stay, regardless of circumstances. Now, that is all fine and good, and I understand I agreed to it. However, after having a last minute emergency, my group went from needing 2 rooms to only one. I called 6 days in advance to see if we could work something out, and no dice. I understand policies are policies for a reason, but my issue comes here: when I asked if I would be in the same situation whether I cancelled 6 days in advance, or when we showed up at the motel, I was told yes, but it would be NICE of me to cancel now so they could rent the room to someone else, since they are booked up. The representative knows fully well that they are highly likely to rebook that room in the next 6 days, and they are simply being greedy wanting to be able to charge someone else full price for the room, and keep my deposit, essentially getting paid double for the room. In my opinion, this was incredibly poor customer service and business policy, and I would not recommend that others do business with this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Decent stay”
Reviews.Author: Alyson N
Reviews.Content: We stayed here last August. It is affordable, I loved the balconies, and it is very close to the beach. It was decent and clean. The worst part was the uncomfortable beds. We had a terrible time trying to fall asleep and would not stay there again because of the uncomfortable beds. It was decently close to everything and down a somewhat quieter end of OCMD. We took the bus to the boardwalk. The pool was ok but a little shallow for my liking because it only goes up to 5 feet.

Reviews.Title: “I will always come back.”
Reviews.Author: oceancitylove
Reviews.Content: This is the only place I will stay in ocean city. I have gone to ocean city almost every year of my life, and there have only been 2 times when I have not stayed here, and I hated it. The beachmark will always and forever be my favorite place to stay in ocean city. The staff is always so nice. The maids are very friendly and we always have everything we need in our room. The pool is amazing. It's really big and it's not too hot and not to cold. It's a little cold in the morning, but who cares? It's the morning when the sun hasn't warmed it up yet. The rooms are just like home. The beds are very comfortable and I love it. It's only about a minute walk from the ocean. It's great. To sum it all up, I love everything about this motel. I have never had a bad experience here and I will continue to come here every time I stay in ocean city. I will not stay anywhere else. At the beachmark, I feel at home. 73rd street & coastal highway, is my place<3.

Reviews.Title: “Decent OC motel close to beach”
Reviews.Author: Greeneyedellen
Reviews.Content: Pros - big room, good friendly maid service, fridge in room, very close to beach (but no views), balconies (we love to people watch), big pool. Cons- fairly noisy at times (we could hear banging above us and something that sounded like pipes rattling/shaking) Ive heard worse but it should be noted, parking is at a premium (to be fair this is nearly all of OC), the room is clean but old and a bit musty. All in all not a bad motel. I would stay here again, not because I loved it, but because OC motels are such a gamble and the Beachmark is definitely more good than bad.

Reviews.Title: “A great family beach vacation motel”
Reviews.Author: camJohnstown_Pa
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Beachmark for three years in a row now. This year, we had three rooms, my husband and I and our two sons with their wives. As always, we found the Beachmark to be clean and comfortable and the staff to be courteous and friendly. It may be an older motel, but it is very well kept. The pool is wonderful and we love the location. There are many places within walking distance. We would definitely recommend the Beachmark. The General's Kitchen serves some of the best breakfasts around!

Reviews.Title: “The pool was cool”
Reviews.Author: kenypower
Reviews.Content: The pool was great, probably the nicest pool in OC, however the radiator outside our room was leaking, the hallways smell really weird, we found a pair of jean shorts inside the fold out couch, and we were borderline sexually harassed by the cleaning staff, but yea I loved the pool so yea the Bmark is deffinatly were you Wana be. ;)

Reviews.Title: “Memories made for 2011”
Reviews.Author: diter2011
Reviews.Content: Beachmark made our trip a memory maker. The pool was exciting for my granddaughters. It was very easy to get to the beach. Housekeeping was terrific each day. We were able to have breakfast and lunch to cut down on eating out so at night we could spend for nice dinners and hit the boardwalk to entertain the kids. We have been staying at the beachmark for years and will continue to stay there. The prices for two rooms was reasonable for the week which did help in makiing our Ocean City memories.

Reviews.Title: “okay for price”
Reviews.Author: alexstep
Reviews.Content: Do not stay on third floor. Air Conditioning not great because of flat roof on hotel. Does not cool room until late in the night. Has no alarm clock or toaster in room. Can't really complain because of the price. The pool is great. Just was uncomfortable sleeping and if your kids want toast, oh well. Also coffee makers very old.

Reviews.Title: “always coming back”
Reviews.Author: dar3elk
Reviews.Content: to the scabies people,,,,maybe you should clean yourself up better, i am a nurse and i know you can't get scabies that way,,,check your friends,,,this place is so enjoyable we come back every year, in fact we reserve 4 rooms for the entiore family and never have a problem.... close to beach, pool is amazing....and clean..... coming back iagain in 2011, 2012, 2013,,,God willing!!!

Reviews.Title: “to the scabies review”
Reviews.Author: beachbum41181
Reviews.Content: To the person who stayed there and said they got scabies---Scabies don`t show up for about 2 weeks---It is a personal hygiene issue---It only comes from close contact with someone who has them----You already had them before you stayed there---We love the place---It`s clean and the staff is very accomodating. We go there 3 or 4 times a summer---We highly recommend it---The pool is awesome !!!!

Reviews.Title: “A great Place to stay for a family!”
Reviews.Author: Hand1271
Reviews.Content: The beachmark is a great place to stay for a family on a budget. :) We would recommend it to anyone with small children or even teenages! Not to mention the gererals kitchen is right below for a very affordable breakfast. It's located right on the Costal highway within walking distance to buses, restaurants and the beach. The hotel is Ocean City which is very nice with children. Not having to cross the nusy street. As long as you understand the is truly a no frills place but just a nice efficency with a great pool; you will come back again. The have great rates as well!

Reviews.Title: “Sufficient. Decent sized room and pool with close proximity to beach.”
Reviews.Author: CorinnaHRN
Reviews.Content: LOCATION: About 100 steps from the beach. Perfect if you are planning on spending all of your time at the beach. Cannot walk to boardwalk. SLEEPING: 2 Double beds and a sleeper sofa. Slept my family of 6 nicely. Beds were comfortable enough, did not come with enough pillows or sheets for the sofa bed. I discovered this around 11pm, and luckily caught the office worker before they left for the night. I am not sure what we would have done if we came in any later. Not sure if someone stays on site if we were to lose our room key. BATHROOM: Outdated, but sufficient. Had a hairdryer, but no clothesline to hang wet bathing suits from. KITCHENETTE: Came with 4 cup coffee maker (no coffee that I saw), Microwave and two burner stove. Microwave was small, but heated leftovers fine. Full sized refrigerator, which was nice. BALCONY: All of the rooms faced the pool, Big Peckers restaurant, and noisy street. This is the only reason I would not stay here again, and the reason I would not recommend the motel to a friend. ACCESS TO ROOM: Crazy steep steps with random cigarette butts. It was hard to figure out how to get to my room! POOL: Nice size for my 4 kids. 2.5 feet to 5 feet, so no diving. CLEANLINESS: I am not a neat freak, so I was okay. BUT, I did see a dead mouse in the parking lot, as well as dirty drawers in the room. I was also surprised to see the house keeping staff smoking in the hallways. They did shut the pool down for a couple of hours when a child had an accident in the pool. I saw them testing the water, but didn't stick around to see how they treated it.

Reviews.Title: “adequate”
Reviews.Author: seniormabrown
Reviews.Content: adequate quality room given closeness to the beach. sleeps six but no privacy if non family members are staying with you. large fridge small microwave and two stove top burners with some pots and pans coffee cups and glasses plates and utensils dish cloth and dish towels also a coffee maker. outside shower and foot sprayer. no elevators first set of steps are narrow and steep second set not as bad balcony to entrance of room is narrow back balcony is separated from other room some rooms are adjoining. pool is 2.5 to 5 foot in depth. one bathroom. bring your own beach towels. just steps from the beach. a few places to shop and eat across the street. located on 73rd street. would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: doe_eyes18229
Reviews.Content: We rented a room for a quick weekend get away, it was very enjoyable! The staff was very nice, there was an over abundance of towels (which was nice) and for a weekend trip it was perfect. Not too expensive, close to excellent restaurants...would stay here again in a heart beat.....there is no elevator, but the steps were really not bad at all, we stayed on the 3rd floor and we did not mind it at all.

Reviews.Title: “Second year in a row for the Beachmark!”
Reviews.Author: camJohnstown_Pa
Reviews.Content: Last year, we had 8 rooms of family at the Beachmark and everyone so enjoyed themselves that my husband and I decided to stay there again even though we were going alone. We again found the Beachmark to be clean and comfortable and love the location. The General's Kitchen serves some of the best breakfasts around at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: Lanitac
Reviews.Content: Thought this was a nice hotel inexpensive and close to the beach. WRONG We stayed with our young children and my youngest ended up with scabies!!!!! The maid was rude because when we left despite the fact that she had not cleaned our room all weekend she came out on the balcony as we were packing up and said "Hey you have to wash your own dishes" WTH! Don't stay here yeah the price is ok but I could have paid a little more and gotten something better without the scabies!

Reviews.Title: “Affordable for Family”
Reviews.Author: DLB1952
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here for 3 years and find it great for a family vacation. It is close to the beach and has a very nice pool. While it does not have all the amentities of the Quality or Holiday Inn, it is still very clean and spacious. I would recommend a first floor pool side room though. There is no elevator and the stairs to go up to the second and third levels are very steep. I almost broke my ankle coming down one day. From now on I will stay on the first floor.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for the Price”
Reviews.Author: beachluvr8907
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I always go to Ocean City at the beginning and the end of the summer. We recently graduated from college and are, well, broke. So we always looked for a hotel that had a great price for what you get. After trying several hotels and being disappointed we thought we would give this one a shot. We loved it. I called to make the reservation 2 days ahead of time, nothing like last minute, and they were quick to give me a good rate. The room had plenty of space, a full size refrigerator that actually worked, a microwave that actually worked, and a stove that actually worked. The location was great because it was right in the middle of the OC strip, not too far to drive in either direction. The room and bathroom was very clean, I was very impressed. The people who worked there were all very nice too. After going through several hotels and being completely appalled by the overall experience I would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very affordable!”
Reviews.Author: CocoPhiladelpjia
Reviews.Content: This motel has a great location, only a few steps away from the beach!! The room has a full size fridge and small stove top with two burners. Our room was clean and the housekeers were very friendly and came early every mornin to make sure that we had towels.....The pool was the best!!! I would recommend this motel to families with children and those who are looking for an affordable get away!!!! The rooms accomodate up to six!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly suprised...would definitely recommend”
Reviews.Author: iachini04
Reviews.Content: We booked this motel at the last minute, when we had to cancel our original vacation dates/plans. I was a little hesitant, showing up sight unseen for a week with 2 young kids at that. First off, upon pulling up to the convenient location, I was suprised that the exterior of the building looked cleaner and nicer than in the pics I had seen on the Internet-(usually its the other way around), then I encountered the office staff, which was wonderful and pleasant and very accommodating. (I could have asked them to do cartwheels and they just may have...lol!) Our room was a fair size, very clean, with a balcony view of their massive outdoor pool, which was clean as well. The beds were comfortable-(a big plus). We had a small kitchenette, that had 2 stove burners, sink, micro, and a full-size refrigerator/freezer. This was a nice suprise because other places we have stayed that claimed the room had a kitchenette, it was a small dorm-size fridge, and no stove. This was an amenity that was soooo convenient. Also, it ws very quiet and family oriented, there was no noise after dark, etc. A very comfortable family/senior environment. The location of the Beachmark was awesome-(again, especially with kids). They say 1 block from the beach, but in reality the only thing between you and the ocean is the Beachmark Condominiums and sand. It was no walk at all--(even with kids, sand toys, chairs, boogie boards, etc.) The only thing I could point out as a negative was that the Beachmark is 3 floors and there is no elevator. Wasnt bad for us, but I could see that being unfavorable with some people. We were happy with our stay there and will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT stay here unless your broke!”
Reviews.Author: built2last
Reviews.Content: Sorry but this place is worn down, old, and simply not a place that is comfortable at all. If you are short money and need to get away then I suggest you go to the pool and sleep there. The pool is nice and you are close to the beach but other than that - the place has nothing to offer at all. The beds are bad, the pillows are worse, the facilities are so worn you won't want to touch anything! Did I mention the towels are like sand paper?

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Cheap”
Reviews.Author: Deoh9
Reviews.Content: Being my first time to Ocean City I was unsure what to expect. I was told by friends that most hotels are motels that would be bellow my standards. We were only staying in the hotel to sleep at night, during the day we would be at the beach and at night at the bars or the boardwalk. When I arrived at the Beachmark, the lady at the front desk (can not remember her name) was very friendly and willing to negotiate a reasonable price. I told her I would take the room as long as I could see it first, and she was happy to accomidate my request. The room was a little dated but very clean and most importantly the sheets were clean, needless to say I took the room. I was told that every room is a 2 full suite. Each room had a full refrigerator, sink, stocked cabinets, and two burners. There was also a desk, two chairs, a leather couch and tv on a wide dresser as well as a mirror. The bathroom looks like it may have been renivated recently or it is cleaned extensively. The location was great, no more than 25 steps to sand, and our area of the beach great, just the right amount of people. Beachmark also boast having the 2nd largest pool located in the courtyard, although we never used it, it appeared clean. 73rd street is a great location as well because is a market and a few restraunts within a 2 minute walk, your also away from the noise of the boardwalk. Additionally Generals Kitchen is built into the Beachmark, a great place for breakfast. Overall the Beachmark is a great place to stay, clean and affordable. The kitchen aspect seemed appealling for guest who would be staying for a week, and would rather cook food then eat out every night.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed very much”
Reviews.Author: nurseeo
Reviews.Content: I was sure I had reviewed this motel before but am unable to find it. This was the second time I stayed here and we ended up with the same room. Which was great. I brought my Granddaughter and my Mother this year. We had a great time , rooms were kept clean , with towels etc. Beds were not bad , not the supreme serta mattresses , but were fine. I like the idea of being able to cook a meal if I want etc. We got clean kitchen linen each day also. The pool is large and clean and they improved the look since the year before. Only thing wrong is no elevator which is hard on my Mom to walk up the stairs. But it is not many. Short walk to beach. Price not bad either. Get the bus to go to boardwalk. Will try to add pics. Stayed last year at another hotel closer to boardwalk but stayed here on way back home after trip to Va Beach. only one night , that was noisy as I forgot it was Bike week :(

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service - uncomfortable beds!”
Reviews.Author: geneseo90
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel based on the reviewers on this very forum. We booked last minute and this was about the only thing I could find. The price was very reasonable by Ocean City standards. However, the place had quite an odor in the hallways and in the rooms. Parking was a disaster. The first full day we were there, the maids never showed up to clean our room. When they did come the next few days, is about all they did was leave fresh towels and make the beds. The counters and tables were not wiped down and the bathroom never looked clean to me. The beds were the worst hotel beds I've ever slept on. It was like sleeping on a box spring rather than a mattress. There were two blankets in the closet that were't on the beds. When I pulled them down to cover my kids they stunk horribly - like they hadn't been washed in awhile. Also, the rooms have air conditioning units. They are so loud that you could barely sleep at night because of the noise. The front desk was very rude when I called and complained about the maid that didn't show up. And they were SHOCKED when I told them how disappointed I was when I checked out! It is a cheap hotel but you get what you pay for. You are better off spending more money and getting something better.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't even get past the front desk...”
Reviews.Author: skippy1332
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I wanted a nice, but not unaffordable, place to stay in OC for our 4-year anniversary. We made reservations through an online database of ocean city rentals. When we arrived at the hotel, the front office told us they didn't have our reservation, they said the online system we used wasn't correct and not valid because we never received an email from them. They had no available rooms except for that night, and perhaps, a night to night basis (we were supposed to be booked thurs-sun). They then preceded to tell us that this happenes all the time, and the same thing had happened to someone else the day before! Of course, we accepted this as being our own fault and we were lucky enough to be able to book another hotel for our stay. However, the front desk of the hotel we DID stay at was appalled by the Beachmark's behavior. They use the same system, and said that management is supposed to check the system and make sure there are enough rooms available for those booking online. Even if the room wasn't available, some form of notification of that would be nice! Looking back on it now, it seems like the perfect way to ensure your rooms are always filled, and get people to stay for individual nights, just overbook! My boyfriend and I are young enough to be flexible about our vacation. What would have happened had we been a family of four with 2 young kids expecting a room there? That's just not the kind of service I would want in a rental.

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend”
Reviews.Author: alama
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Ocean City and we stayed at the Beachmark. We were disappointed with the location of the motel, right on Coastal Highway. The rooms were not kept clean, the rooms and hallways had an odor to them. Daily maid service really didn't clean the rooms at all, just gave us clean towels and made our beds. People in the office were courteous and polite. My kids enjoyed the oversized pool. The rates were very reasonable but next time, I rather pay extra and stay at a more pleasant hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for a good place!”
Reviews.Author: JJ4Eva
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at The Beachmark Motel during the first weekend in August. We booked it as it had the cheapest prices and was still on the Ocean side of town. We were a little concerned as we have never heard of the place before, but after our stay we will definitely be back! We liked it was far enough away from the boardwalk but close enough to take the bus and not have an hour ride back and forth. It was also very quiet! You can occasionaly hear the loud bikes or cars on the street (as the hotel is right on the main street) or you might also hear the sirens from fire engines as it is right across from the station. However, once nightfall came, these sounds were few and far between. My wife is very picky when it comes to noise and even she slept through the nite! The room itself was a little old (as are most rooms in OC), but it was very clean. The beds were comfy and the A/C worked great. Housekeeping was on top of things -- we left for about an hour and came back and our room was cleaned and fresh stocked. The rooms also have dishes, a full-size refrigerator, and stovetop, and sink so there is no need to go out to eat for all meals (hopefully that saves a bit of money). While we were there, the beach, although a very short walk away, was infested with grasshoppers! It felt like we were part of a plague or something! So we spent most of the time at the huge pool the hotel had. We saw someone cleaning it every morning and it was big enough to where one could swim laps if they wanted and not interfere with anyone else in the pool. The only thing that went wrong (beside the grasshoppers, which is no way was the hotel's fault) was that it took us forever to find the stairs -- maybe we just arent too bright :) The hotel has plenty of restaurants and stores within walking distance. All in all, we are extremely pleased with our stay and as I said in the beginning, we will definitely be back -- along with the rest of our family!

Reviews.Title: “Wasn't that bad.”
Reviews.Author: ERat
Reviews.Content: We wanted to spend a couple of day at the beach without spending an arm and a leg. This motel fit the bill. It was without a doubt the most affordable places that I called. We were going on short notice and most of the other places were either booked or charging $200+ per night. I was totally satisfied with the price. The last time I went to OC we stayed on the boardwalk and I swore that I would never go back. I hated the entire place. We decided to try OC again, this time nowhere near the boardwalk. I was pleased to find out that this motel is on the north side of OC. It's in the much calmer and more laid back section of town. There are condos and houses surrounding the motel. I felt like we were in a neighborhood and not a tourist trap. The motel is an older building, but it fits in with the other building in the area. It has the biggest pool in OC and it is very easy to find a spot to chill out. The beach is only 30 steps away from the motel. We got a side room where you could sit out on the balcony and see the ocean. There is a building between the back of the motel and the beach, but you can see the ocean if you're on the side. The only complaint is that there isn't an elevator. We were on the 3rd floor, not a big problem. But if you're lugging up 3 bags of luggage it can be a little difficult. The room was just fine. The bathrooms are old, but very clean. The beds were ok. A little soft for my liking, but it wasn't bad. The room had a fridge, stove, and you could use one of the irons from the front office. Overall I was pleased with my stay at the Beachmark. I would go back, if the price is right. I wouldn't pay more than $90 to stay here, it is a pretty good place if you're on a budget or have limited choices. I still don't care that much for OC, but by staying at the Beachmark I've stopped "HATING" OC and now consider it an OK place to spend a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: “This place is fine- great pool!”
Reviews.Author: 3familytraveler
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Beachmark this past August - the week before Labor Day. Although the hotel got generally good reviews I was a little nervous because it wasn't very expensive compared to a lot of hotels on the beach. Don't be afraid to stay here - the place is fine. It's an older hotel but the room was big (with a full sized refridgerator in the kitchenette, couch, table and chairs, etc), clean and in a nice location. The only thing I wasn't crazy about was the bathroom- which was small and had old fixtures (but it was pretty clean.) This hotel has a big, nice pool with lots of chaise lounges and tables with umbrellas. It is less than a block to the beach and you don't have to cross any roads to get to it. The Beachmark is about a mile or so up from the boardwalk area. Take the city bus - it's $2 to ride all day - makes frequent stops- very easy to use - to go down to the boardwalk, resturants, etc. Would definately stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: The Beachmark Motel
